title: Non-Verbal Reasoning Practice
description: Practice pattern recognition, sequences, and logical reasoning without relying on language skills

questions.question: In a sequence, the first shape is a circle, the second is a square, the third is a triangle, and the fourth is a circle again. Following this pattern, what would be the 7th shape?
A box contains 12 balls arranged in 3 rows of 4 balls each. If you remove 2 balls from the first row and 1 ball from the second row, how many balls remain in the box?
If you fold a square piece of paper in half twice and then cut a small triangle from one corner, how many holes will you see when you unfold the paper completely?
In a grid of 16 squares (4x4), if every square in the top row is shaded and every square in the leftmost column is shaded, how many squares are shaded in total?
A pattern shows: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?. Each number is doubled to get the next number. Following this rule, what is the next number in the sequence?
